short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly close all tabs with a blick of a button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Tab Eraser Chrome extension optimizes your browsing experience with a single click. Designed by an experienced developer proficient in Chrome extension development, it swiftly closes all inactive tabs while preserving the active one. This intuitive tool enhances productivity and declutters your workspace effortlessly.

This efficiency boost eliminates the time-consuming task of manually closing tabs, allowing you to focus on your active task without distraction. Whether you're deep into research, juggling multiple projects, or simply organising your online activities, the Tab Eraser extension optimizes your workflow, enhances concentration, and empowers you to achieve more in less time.
